desc: This proceedings set contains selected Computer, Information and Education Technology related papers from the 2014 International Conference on Computer, Intelligent Computing and Education Technology (CICET 2014), held March 27-28, 2014 in Hong Kong. The proceedings aims to provide a platform for researchers, engineers and academics as well as industry professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Computer Science, Information Technology and Education Technology.

details.authors: Hsiang-Chuan Liu, Wen-Pei Sung, Wenli Yao

title: Computer, Intelligent Computing and Education Technology
